title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Online Strength-Based Leadership Practice Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Experience in Organizational Management and Leadership
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can derive three or more strength profiles using self-ethnographic reflection tools.
Learners can design motivation strategies for team members using a strengths-based approach.
Learners can complete a strengths-sharing project using LMS-based collaboration tools and incorporate peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
